title: So DQ
body:
Me and my friend went in duo, chose mid with fill as secondary he chose support with fill as secondary, he gets mid i get support, why is this a thing we primary opposite positions and get the other. is this how DQ is supposed to work, im get sick of constant playing support, climbing is impossible without a duo as a support because most silver/bronze adc suck ass

tl:dr

Primary/Secondary is bs, rito give you whatever they want

replies.body:
Sounds like a bug to me. 

There's been some reports around with the _"fill"_ role having strange behaviour. I recommend you post something [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) about it, or send **Riot** support your match history link and see what they can do for you :D

> To be clear though, **Riot** does prioritize your primary role over your secondary. 
> 
> **Riot Chomney** clarifies this on Reddit [here](https://np.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/42siqd/your_primary_role_should_be_weighted_more/czd4gth?context=10000). If you keep scrolling on that post actually, you'll see some people sent him games to check out where role select didn't work properly. All of them turned out to be mistakes/misunderstandings.
well you're a duo so it doesnt matter to the system probably

> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hdxxO1x2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-23T02:20:54.708+0000)
>
> well you're a duo so it doesnt matter to the system probably

That kind of thinking results in duo mids, mister.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hdxxO1x2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-23T03:06:24.502+0000)
>
> That kind of thinking results in duo mids, mister.

no it results in swapping roles

...say what? You chose Mid as primary and your friend chose Fill as secondary but he got mid?

The dynamic queue just gets better and better with time, loving the work Riot.
